channel.title: GeneSetEnrichment on Monash Bioinformatics Platform
channel.description: Recent content in GeneSetEnrichment on Monash Bioinformatics Platform

item.title: Mitch: Multivariate pathway enrichment for multi-omics and single-cell profiling data
item.description: Inference of biological pathway activity via gene set enrichment analysis is a frequently used approach in the interpretation of clinical and other omics data

item.title: Discoverability bias and its influence on gene-set testing
item.description: Gene-set enrichment analyses are the most commonly used class of analyses for distilling genomics data into biological knowledge
